fields.fieldDescription: N/A
The code for the payment method type associated with the outgoing DDA message.
The Demand Deposit Account number referenced in the outgoing DDA message.
The amount of the outgoing DDA debit or credit.
The branch that owns the demand deposit account referenced in the message.
The currency in which the amount of the outgoing DDA message is expressed.
The accounting operation code (indicating whether the outgoing DDA message represents a debit or a credit).
The value date of the outgoing DDA message.
The business date of the outgoing DDA message.
The Record ID (RID) for the servicing group associated with this transaction.
The Record ID (RID) for the cashflow associated with this transaction.
Indicates whether or not the outgoing DDA message is associated with the reversal of a prior transaction.
Indicates whether or not the outgoing DDA message is associated with a Stand By Letter of Credit (SBLC) transaction.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
The name of the Demand Deposit Account referenced in the message.
The service name of the target system (e.g. PBS).
The description of the transaction for which the outgoing DDA message is being sent.
The Record ID (RID) for the owner of the demand deposit account.
The Record ID (RID) for the deal associated with this transaction.
The Record ID (RID) for the facility associated with this transaction.
The name of the deal associated with this transaction.
The name of the facility associated with this transaction.
The sequence number of the reversal transaction (if applicable).
The type of customer owning the demand deposit account referenced in the message.
"The transmission queue status code (delivered, etc.)."
"The text of the ""to"" string defined in the Preferred Remittance Instruction attached to the cashflow associated with the outgoing DDA message."
The transmission sequence number for this message.
The timestamp (indicating the date and time that the outgoing DDA message was sent).
Reference data returned by the target system.
The priority code of the outgoing DDA message (from cashflow)..
The alias for the underlying loan of the loan transaction (if any) that created this DDA message.
The posting date of the outgoing DDA message (the date the DDA entry was passed from LS2 to the DDA system).
